definitions.definition: Any substance used to facilitate the fixing of a dye to a fibre ; usually a metallic compound which reacts with the dye using chelation .
Any corrosive substance used in etching .
A glutinous size used as a ground for gilding , to make the gold leaf adhere .

main_definition: Any substance used to facilitate the fixing of a dye to a fibre ; usually a metallic compound which reacts with the dye using chelation .
secondary_definitions: Any corrosive substance used in etching .
A glutinous size used as a ground for gilding , to make the gold leaf adhere .
